/* eslint-disable no-unused-vars */ import React, { useState } from "react"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; export const Form = () => { const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(""); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const [roomType, setRoomType] = useState(""); const [adults, setAdults] = useState(0); const [children, setChildren] = useState(0); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(null); const [startTime, setStartTime] = useState(null); const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState(null); const [endTime, setEndTime] = useState(null); const [isFormValid, setIsFormValid] = useState(false); const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return (

Prenota

{/* NAME AND LASTNAME */}
{/* NAME */}
setFirstName(e.target.value)} required />
{/* LASTNAME */}
setLastName(e.target.value)} required />
{/* EMAIL */}
setEmail(e.target.value)} required />
{/* PHONE NUMBER */}
setPhone(e.target.value)} required />
{/* ROOM TYPE */}
{/* NUMBER OF ADULTS */}
setAdults(e.target.value)} required />
{/* NUMBER OF CHILDREN */}
setChildren(e.target.value)} required />
{/* BOOKING PERIOD - CHECK-IN */}
setStartDate(e.target.value)} required />
{/* BOOKING PERIOD - CHECK-OUT */}
setEndDate(e.target.value)} required />
{/* DATA PROCESSING */}
{/* SUBMIT BUTTON */}
); };
